original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>無中生有計謀成功，獲得了<color=#13ccd7>糧草 $num1</color>！與我方友好度略有下降…(<color=#bceea7>無中生有 成功</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent someone to succeed in a strategy against <color=#fff999>$country1</color>, and they have won <color=#13ccd7>grain $num1</color>! The friendship with us declined slightly...(<color=#bceea7>Success out of nothing</color>)
